text: Eh, kau dah makan ke belum? Jom kita pergi mamak lepak kejap.
english: Hey, have you eaten yet? Let's go hang out at the mamak for a bit.

text: Wah, macam best je tempat ni! Boleh kita ambil gambar sini tak?
english: Wow, this place looks so nice! Can we take a photo here?

text: Alamak, saya lupa bawa dompet la. Boleh tolong bayar dulu tak? Nanti saya transfer balik.
english: Oh no, I forgot to bring my wallet. Can you pay first? I'll transfer you back later.

text: Betul ke benda ni? Saya rasa macam tak betul je, cuba check balik.
english: Is this correct? I feel like something's wrong, try checking again.

text: Okay, so basically kita kena siapkan report ni sebelum Jumaat, kalau tak boss akan marah.
english: Okay, so basically we need to finish this report before Friday, or the boss will be angry.

text: Terima kasih banyak-banyak ya! Awak memang baik hati, saya sangat hargai bantuan awak.
english: Thank you so much! You're really kind-hearted, I really appreciate your help.

text: Saya dah penat sangat ni, kerja non-stop dari pagi. Nak balik rehat kejap boleh tak?
english: I'm really tired, been working non-stop since morning. Can I go home and rest for a bit?

text: Jangan risau la, benda ni senang je sebenarnya. Sini, saya tunjuk macam mana nak buat.
english: Don't worry, this is actually easy. Here, let me show you how to do it.

text: Selamat pagi! Cuaca hari ni cantik kan? Jom kita pergi jogging dekat taman tu.
english: Good morning! The weather today is nice, isn't it? Let's go jogging at that park.

text: Maaf, saya tak faham apa yang awak cakap tadi. Boleh ulang sekali lagi dengan perlahan sikit?
english: Sorry, I didn't understand what you said just now. Can you repeat it more slowly?
